author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the olive oil in a saucepan, add the onion and fry until softened. Add the passata, stock, spinach, salt and freshly ground black pepper and simmer for 3-4 minutes. Blend with a hand blender until smooth. To serve, pour into a serving bowl.
ingredients: dash olive oil,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  75ml/2½fl oz tomato passata (sieved tomatoes),  300ml/½ pint hot vegetable stock,  125g/4½oz fresh spinach leaves,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
